meanings.definition: A flask-shaped structure in which fungal spores are produced.
meanings.sent1: The perithecia release spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study perithecia to understand how fungal spores spread.
meanings.sent3: The perithecia decided to have a spore party.
meanings.sent4: The perithecia stood tall like tiny spore factories.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the perithecia looked like miniature flasks filled with spores.
